changeSet.author: Grigorovich
changeSet.sql: create table work_list ( id int auto_increment, work_list_name varchar(50), work_list_coast varchar(50), work_list_spare_part_id int, constraint work_list_pk primary key (id), constraint work_list_spare_part_fk foreign key (work_list_spare_part_id) references spare_part (spare_part_id) );
